2024-25-term-1.title: Growing Green: Community Plants for a Brighter Future
2024-25-term-1.description: Tree plantation drive at Green Sunrise Hills, Wagholi, where students planted Jamun saplings to promote sustainability, improve air quality, and support biodiversity.

2024-25-term-1.title: Dashboard Making Competition
2024-25-term-1.description: A competitive event focused on data visualization and analytics where students designed interactive dashboards and were evaluated on innovation, usability, and insights.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industrial Visit to Radiant IT Services Pvt. Ltd.
2024-25-term-1.description: Second-year students visited Radiant IT Services Pvt. Ltd., Pune, gaining exposure to web and full-stack development practices and strengthening academia–industry collaboration.

2024-25-term-1.title: Parents Teacher Meet
2024-25-term-1.description: An interactive session to strengthen parent–teacher communication, discuss academic progress, placement initiatives, student well-being, and departmental vision.

2024-25-term-1.title: Teacher’s Day Celebration
2024-25-term-1.description: A celebration honoring teachers with speeches, cultural activities, and tokens of appreciation, expressing gratitude for their guidance and mentorship.

2024-25-term-1.title: DSY Induction Program
2024-25-term-1.description: Induction program for Direct Second Year students introducing department vision, curriculum, facilities, research initiatives, and career pathways.

2024-25-term-1.title: AMCAT Test & Career Guidance Session
2024-25-term-1.description: AMCAT assessment conducted for B.Tech students along with a session on career opportunities and preparation strategies after AMCAT.

2024-25-term-1.title: Expert Lecture on Career Opportunities after B.Tech
2024-25-term-1.description: Guidance session highlighting diverse career paths after B.Tech, including higher studies, competitive exams, and industry roles.

2024-25-term-1.title: Educational Visit to COEP’s Bhau Institute
2024-25-term-1.description: Educational tour to Bhau Institute of Innovation, Entrepreneurship, and Leadership at COEP, exposing students to incubation and innovation ecosystems.

2024-25-term-1.title: SoulSync Yoga and Meditation Program
2024-25-term-1.description: A wellness program focusing on yoga, meditation, stress management, and mental well-being for students and faculty.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industrial Visit to HeadstartX Technologies
2024-25-term-1.description: Third-year students gained exposure to web and full-stack development practices at HeadstartX Technologies, Pune.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industrial Visit to NonStop io Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
2024-25-term-1.description: Second-year students visited NonStop io Technologies Pvt. Ltd., learning about modern software solutions and industry workflows.

2024-25-term-1.title: Art Festival (Shivjayanti)
2024-25-term-1.description: Cultural festival celebrating Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Jayanti with performances, competitions, and student participation.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industrial Visit to IISER Pune
2024-25-term-1.description: Visit to IISER Pune where students explored interdisciplinary research facilities and high-end computing infrastructure.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industrial Visit to IMD Pune
2024-25-term-1.description: Students gained insights into meteorological observation, weather forecasting systems, and radar technologies at IMD Pune.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industrial Visit to CDAC Pune
2024-25-term-1.description: Visit to CDAC’s PARAM Supercomputing Facility, exposing students to High Performance Computing and parallel processing technologies.

2024-25-term-1.title: Industrial Visit to IUCAA Pune
2024-25-term-1.description: Educational visit to IUCAA Open Day where students explored astronomy research, demonstrations, and science outreach activities.

2024-25-term-1.title: Parents Teacher Meet
2024-25-term-1.description: A follow-up PTM focusing on academic performance, placements, student counseling, and overall development.

2024-25-term-1.title: Coffee Cup Meet
2024-25-term-1.description: An informal interaction session aimed at improving student–faculty bonding and open communication.

2024-25-term-1.title: Visit to Maher Orphanage and Old Age Home
2024-25-term-1.description: Community service visit to Maher Ashram, Wagholi, where faculty members donated essentials and interacted with children and residents.

2023-24.title: Annual Tech Fest 2023
2023-24.description: Annual technology festival featuring coding challenges, tech talks, and networking events.
